name: The Gaze
description: A piercing ray of clarity that cuts through the nightmare, damaging all shadows in a straight line.

name: The Void
description: Opens a tear in the dream that drags nearby impulses into the depths of oblivion.

name: Resonance
description: A ripple of pure will that flows across the battlefield, shattering the delusions it touches.

name: Sun Gate
description: Opens a portal to the waking world, scorching the nightmares with the searing heat of reality.
